title: 24 hours of chaos as mental health grants are slashed then restored
description: For 24 hours, it was unclear which mental health and addiction programs would survive and who would still have jobs when the dust settled.
content: For 24 hours, it was unclear which mental health and addiction programs would survive and who would still have jobs when the dust settled.
